Cleanse perineum.sentence: The nurse gathers all necessary supplies for the perineal cleansing procedure.
Cleanse perineum.subject: The nurse
Cleanse perineum.tools: antiseptic solution, sterile wipes, gloves, and a clean towel

Cleanse perineum.sentence: The nurse puts on disposable gloves to maintain hygiene during the procedure.
Cleanse perineum.subject: The nurse

Cleanse perineum.sentence: The nurse positions the patient comfortably to allow easy access to the perineal area.
Cleanse perineum.subject: The nurse
Cleanse perineum.tools: a clean bed or examination table

Cleanse perineum.sentence: The nurse applies the antiseptic solution to a sterile wipe to cleanse the perineum.
Cleanse perineum.subject: The nurse
Cleanse perineum.object: the antiseptic solution to a sterile wipe

Cleanse perineum.sentence: The nurse gently wipes the perineal area from front to back to ensure thorough cleansing.
Cleanse perineum.subject: The nurse
Cleanse perineum.object: the perineal area from front to back
